label: Reusable Drinkware
description: Products designed for multiple uses to carry and consume beverages.
intents: Reduce waste by using a reusable drink container.
Find a durable and convenient drink container for outdoor activities.
Keep beverages at desired temperature while on the go.

subcategories.label: Water Bottles
subcategories.description: Containers designed to hold and transport water.

subcategories.label: Travel Mugs
subcategories.description: Containers designed to keep hot beverages hot and cold beverages cold while on the go.

subcategories.label: Flasks
subcategories.description: Containers designed to keep food and beverages hot or cold for extended periods of time.
